conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric transformation to isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall thickness rendering; perspective is clean and consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Strong layout fidelity; room adjacencies and wall proportions match the blueprint almost perfectly.

interior_elements.notes: Remarkable placement of furniture corresponding to the plan, including the specific sofa arrangement and kitchen island.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean lighting and distinct material separation; no UI/text contamination in the 3D render.

detected_errors.description: Some window openings on the right elevation show slight deviations in framing detail compared to the 2D symbology.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D transformation of the provided floor plan with precise furniture alignment.
